pages.title: Soulsteel Metal
pages.text: Soulsteel is a strong material, with high enchantability.The first step to getting soulsteel is preparing the raw ingredients. This chapter covers the process from start to finish.

pages.name: Getting Soul Dust
pages.text: Soul dust is required for making Raw Soulsteel.

pages.name: Metaldiamond
pages.text: Metaldiamond is used in crafting, and requires a Diamond Block catalyst.

pages.title: Raw Soulsteel
pages.text: Craft a Raw Soulsteel Ingot, which is then smelted.
The Raw Soulsteel, souls trapped inside, must be fed into a furnace to reach it's final form. $(br2)Soulsteel can be crafted into all the well-known armor and weapon pieces.

pages.title: Soulsteel Tools
pages.text: Soulsteel is used to craft various tools and machines in Hearth Well.
